description:
Saves a machine learning model as part of a batch job.

The model will be accompanied by a separate STAC Item that implements the [ml-model extension](https://github.com/stac-extensions/ml-model).

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to store as a machine learning model.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: Additional parameters to create the file(s).

returns.description: Always returns `true` as in case of an error an exception is thrown which aborts the execution of the process.
